title: The Time Fighters
description: INTO A BLACK HOLEAlone! Koenig has gone out into space to investigate a derelict ship -- and while he is away, Moon Base Alpha has been swallowed up by a Black Hole. How can Koenig get back? In his absence, what will happen to Maya whose personality is disintegrating? As she changes from shape to shape, one form more monstrous than the last, she jeopardizes the entire Moon Base. The break-away moon and its commander are facing disaster at the opposite ends of Time and Space.Contains the episodes "Space Warp", "Dorzak", "Devil's Planet", and "The Seance Spectre"
author: Michael Butterworth
